data.title: Company
data.meta_description: Delta Group Electronics is a full scope EMS provider Delta Group Electronics delivers complete solutions to customers who demand top quality and superior service
data.text:
FOCUS & COMMITMENT

Delta Group Electronics, Inc., established in 1987, is a high-mix medium volume to low-mix medium quantity run electronics manufacturing services (EMS) provider recognized by Inc. Magazine as one of the fastest growing small businesses in the United States. The company provides cost-efficient, high-quality assembly of custom wiring harness, cable and turnkey electronic assemblies for its business partners throughout the southern half of the United States. Based in Albuquerque, New Mexico, Delta Group also has assembly operations in Florida, Arkansas, Texas and southern California.

The company maintains an ISO9001/AS9100 quality certification at each facility; along with ISO13485 quality standard at the San Diego, California location. The company also maintains an annual ITAR registration and compliance program to include Distribution D capability through an approved DD2345.

Delta Group maintains a diversified customer base, serving customers in the defense, aerospace, telecommunications and capital equipment industries.

MISSION

To be a growing, profitable electronic manufacturing services company that assembles a high-quality product and offers extensive customer service along with highly dependable product delivery to geographically selected companies in need of outsource manufacturing and to be considered an exceptional place to work.

VALUES

Delta Group is a family-owned business, and its values-Integrity, Excellence, Commitment, Respect, Fairness, Cooperation and Trust-define us as a Company and serve as the foundation of all decisions. Our strict adherence to these tenets ensures our clients and vendors that we perform daily to the highest standard.

Integrity – We will maintain customer relationships with the highest integrity.

Excellence – Our process improvement philosophy drives our company to continuously improve.

Commitment – Our commitment to our customer’s success will be unparalleled.

Respect – We will treat our customers, employees, suppliers, and stakeholders with the utmost respect.

Fairness – We will be fair in all Customer and Employee interactions.

Cooperation – We will strive to cooperate with all of our customer and supplier partners.

Trust – We will be a company who is trusted by customers, suppliers, employees, and our greater communities.

FINANCIAL STRENGTH & OWNERSHIP

In 1987, Delta Group Electronics was incorporated by a small group of investors related by long-term friendships. With the death of Steven Klein in 2002, the remaining investors committed to maintaining the company as a privately-owned, family business. Since 2002, the company has pursued an active program to diversify its customer base and industry concentrations. Through a series of acquisitions and internal growth, Delta Group now operates five facilities throughout the southern half of the United States. The company maintains a strong financial position, evidenced a series of facility investments – construction of a new 37,000 square foot facility in Arkansas in 2011, expansion of the Florida operation by 10,000 square feet in 2014, and the acquisition and renovation of a 49,500 square foot facility in New Mexico in 2015. During the same period, the company has invested more than $3 million for the equipment upgrades and replacements.

The senior management of Delta Group averages more than 15 years of experience in their respective areas of expertise. In addition, these individuals have been active participants in the leadership of the company for many years, averaging more than 10 years of employment at Delta Group.

MANAGEMENT TEAM:

Harry C. Mueller

President & CEO

Brett R. Greer

Vice President of Operations

Director - Corporate Quality Assurance

Director - Human Resources

Director - IT & Information Security

General Manager, Florida Operation

Phil Cutler

General Manager, California Operation

Trey Johnson

General Manager, Texas Operation

Drew Pianalto

General Manager, Arkansas Operation

HISTORY & MILESTONES

Delta Group Electronics, Inc. was founded in 1987 by a small group of investors that included Steven E. Klein and Harry C. Mueller. Mr. Klein served as President of the company from its inception until his death in 2002. Mr. Mueller has served as Chief Executive Officer throughout the life of the company, taking on the additional title of President in 2002. With its initial location in Albuquerque, New Mexico, the company has expanded through internal growth and acquisitions and currently maintains operations in Albuquerque (where the corporate headquarters are also located), San Diego, Dallas, Rockledge, Florida, and Fayetteville, Arkansas.
